title: Text Summarization with BART
description: Abstractive text summarization of dialogues using fine-tuned BART (140M params) with Keras 3 and KerasHub

title: Named Entity Recognition with Transformers
description: Custom transformer NER model from scratch — PER, ORG, LOC, MISC entity recognition on CoNLL 2003 with multi-head self-attention

title: Metric Learning Image Search
description: CNN metric learning for image similarity search using contrastive loss on CIFAR-100 with 8-dimensional normalized embeddings

title: Sentiment Analysis Algorithm
description: Interactive R package for real-time sentiment analysis using AFINN lexicon with auto spelling correction and iterative scoring

title: Body Composition & Anthropometric Analysis
description: Linear mixed-effects models and PCA analyzing health differences across Greek minority schools in Istanbul

title: SARS-CoV-2 Seroprevalence Analysis
description: CDC-affiliated logistic regression on 33K+ blood donors analyzing SARS-CoV-2 seroconversion detection behavior

title: tidyWorldCupR
description: R package for FIFA World Cup data (1930-2014) with Leaflet maps, goal scorers, match info, and emoji flags

title: Claude MCP Extension
description: VS Code extension for managing MCP servers in Claude Code — health checks, enable/disable, plugin discovery
